title: Average annual wages in Italy 2000 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average annual wages in euros, containing a total of 19 data points.
Overall Average annual wages in euros has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Average annual wages in euros, of value 30620.0 was reached at Year 2010
The lowest Average annual wages in euros, of value 29042.0 was reported at Year 2003
